summary: This is an email chain regarding attendance at an upcoming Epstein hearing. The Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC) of FBI New York plans to attend, and another individual confirms they will attend if space permits, requesting not to bump someone from the case team.

persons.name: ADIC
persons.role: Assistant Director in Charge of FBI New York
persons.context: The ADIC plans to attend the Epstein hearing, and seating needs to be reserved for them by SDNY.

events.title: Epstein Hearing
events.description: A hearing related to the Jeffrey Epstein case is scheduled to take place.

keyFacts: The Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC) of FBI New York planned to attend an Epstein hearing scheduled for August 27, 2019.
Seating arrangements for the hearing were being coordinated between the FBI and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY).
An individual offered to attend the hearing only if space was available and specifically requested not to displace a member of the case team.
